Discussions.Discussion_Name: First meeting April 15th, at 2:15 pm in lecture room 6131

Messages.Author: Marc-Oliver Löwner
Messages.Content: Dear students, Our first session for the "Geographical Information Systems" Reading/Practice will be on Monday, April 15th, at 2:15 pm in lecture room 6131. For the rest of the term, we'll divide the group into two. One group will meet on Mondays at 2:15 pm, and the other on Tuesdays at 12:15 pm. I'll let you know about the group arrangements during our first meeting. Looking forward to seeing you then, Marc-O. Löwner
